category-def.name: org.eclipse.equinox.target.categoryIU
category-def.label: Equinox Target Components
category-def.description: Features especially useful to install as PDE runtime targets.

category-def.name: org.eclipse.sdk.ide.categoryIU
category-def.label: Eclipse SDK
category-def.description: The full version of Eclipse, with source and documentation: Platform, JDT and PDE.

category-def.name: org.eclipse.platform.ide.categoryIU
category-def.label: Eclipse Platform
category-def.description: Minimum version of Eclipse: no source or API documentation, no PDE or JDT.

category-def.name: org.eclipse.rcp.categoryIU
category-def.label: Eclipse RCP Target Components
category-def.description: Features to use as PDE runtime target, while developing RCP applications.

category-def.name: org.eclipse.releng.testsIU
category-def.label: Eclipse Tests, Tools, Examples, and Extras
category-def.description: Collection of Misc. Features, such as unit tests, SWT and e4 tools, examples, and compatibility features not shipped as part of main SDK, but which some people may desire in creating products based on previous versions of Eclipse.

category-def.name: org.eclipse.releng.java.languages.categoryIU
category-def.label: Eclipse Java Development Tools
category-def.description: Tools to allow development with Java.

category-def.name: org.eclipse.releng.pde.categoryIU
category-def.label: Eclipse Plugin Development Tools
category-def.description: Tools to develop bundles, plugins and features.
